sentences.en: A Grasshopper , perishing with famine, passed byearnestly begged a little food.
sentences.cn: 饥饿的蚱蜢跑来, 向他们乞讨食物.

sentences.en: But in the meantime we were perishing in the ice, and continually attacked by the Cossacks.
sentences.cn: 可就在当时,我们正处于冻死在冰天雪地的困境, 而且不断受到哥萨克人的袭击.

sentences.en: Can we really afford not to be obediently ready to rescue perishing?
sentences.cn: 我们怎能不随时准备好拯救失丧的人 呢 ?

sentences.en: He's too perishing mean to pay his share.
sentences.cn: 他小气极了,连自己的那份钱也不付.

sentences.en: I can't get in I've lost the perishing key!
sentences.cn: 我进不去--我把该死的钥匙丢了!

sentences.en: I've had enough of this perishing job!
sentences.cn: 这讨厌的差事，我真受够了！

sentences.en: Let me in. I'm perishing with cold.
sentences.cn: 让我进去, 我要冻死了.

sentences.en: People outside are perishing with cold.
Tell those perishing kids to shut up!
sentences.cn: 叫那些该死的孩子闭嘴！

sentences.en: The woodwork of the window frames is perishing.

sentences.cn: 他们的车胎在慢慢老化。

words.tran_cn: 死亡（perish的ing形式）；毁灭；使麻木

trans.tran_cn: （饥、寒等）令人极难受的，冷极的，<英><俚>讨厌的，该死的
trans.tran_en: used to describe someone or something that is annoying you

trans.tran_cn: 丧生( perish的现在分词 )，消亡，死亡，损坏
